titleStmt.title: A new narrative of a fiery apparition seen on several days about Tower-Hill. Or, A just relation of the unjust proceedings of Mr. Sherman, Church-Warden of All-hollows Barkin, London. By Jonathon Sanders, lecturer of the said church
titleStmt.author: Sanders, Jonathan.

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing S576 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 475.
Reproductions of the originals in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library (reel 475), and the Bodleian Library (reel 1897).
